channel.title: Amr Elsekilly
channel.description: Senior Frontend Engineer at Pelcro. I also make OSS contributions, write blog posts, and create videos on YouTube about frontend web development and remote work.

item.title: What's this blog gonna be about?
item.description: I started that by creating my YouTube channel, and getting involved with the tech community in Egypt and the middle-east by providing mentorship, and contributing to the community on social media, events, etc.
item.dc:creator: Amr Elsekilly
